name: Factory Defense (The Emerald Derp Leader)
description:
A top-down action game for Shenanijam 2019. The game wasn't finished due to burnout while making it, but I still had fun. In Factory Defense you are an intern who is in the factory when the robots have revolted. Your job is to destroy the robots by activating traps (denoted by warning signs) with your wrench. The robots are attempting to take you out, so avoid them!

Gameplay video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yND4uDYIwmQ

Shenanijam stuff: I based on the theme Wrenches 101. The only achievement I got is Maverick.

Controls:

  • Use W, A, S, and D to move
  • Press Q to set nearby traps
  • Press escape to pause the game

Note: There is no audio
